content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were returning home around 10:00 p.M. saturday night. we live in a small city just minutes below (south of) memphis, tn. as we rounded the corner of our street, we saw a huge flash of blue light to the north of us. it appeared to come from the ground and filled an entire section of the horizon. we were stunned and actually stopped our car. this light did not appear to be "natural" (i.E., lightening) and we did not know what it was.  later, we caught the tail-end of the 1:00 a.M. re-broadcast of the 10:00 p.M. local news by wmc-channel 5. they apparently had received many phone calls from viewers about this light and they also showed a video clip caught by a viewer by her cell phone camera. it showed what looked like a ufo crossing the sky just prior to the huge flash of light.

my husband did not see the entire report, so we went to wmc's internet site and they have *nothing* on their site about this event and/or their report. we have written to wmc, asking them to post a link about their report, as they have links to many of the news reports they have broadcast.  my husband did say that in what he saw of their report, it was obvious they did not take this event very seriously but were treating it as just another weird natural phenomenon. however that may be, we would very much like to see the video again caught by the local viewer.
content.summary: Ufo filmed crossing sky followed by extremely large flash of light

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i had just finished a day and evening of fishing on lake champlain. we went to the local outside snack bar. as we were waiting for our food, i first noticed a geen glowing pulsating object coming at us from the southeast and heading acrossed our position heading northwest. there was no sound just an intense brightness as it moved in front of us. the speed was incredible, along with the silence, and pulsating. it came in very low maybe 500 feet above us. the whole event from start to finish was maybe 2 minutes. we followed it with our eyes as it headed northwest towards canada. in closing i can only come to one conclusion that what we saw was a ufo. the speed, silence, and pulsating green light, made it the only rational conclusion. one other thing it was close enough to us that when it went by it looked as it would crash because it was so low. as we lost sight of it towards canada, i waited for some kind of crashing or explosion. none happened. i will never forget that night i was in total awe as to what my friend and i had witness. i feel very fortunate to see such a beautiful site in our night sky.
content.summary: Green glowing fast moving object with a small glowing trail

content.detailedDescription: We were approaching the bingham copper mine pit and were on a limited access road.  it was mid-morning and we were driving quite slow with the windows down and the radio off.  as we started toward the top of the hill, a large, dark shadow came over the mountain to the west of us and covered the entire car.  we initially thought it was a cloud, but the shade was much darker than what cloud can provide and the edges were crisp and defined in a circle.  there was no noise, and when we looked out the windows up into the sky the disc shot over the car (as if startled?) and zipped across the valley to hover above the city below.  it stayed motionless for about 15 seconds and then just disappeared.  we didn't see it move off or anything-- it just wasn't there anymore.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Daytime: huge shadow covered our car - no noise- then saw disc shoot off approx 5 miles to hover over city in valley.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to erwin park,  she was walking the dogs and i was flying an rc electric airplane. the air was almost still only a few clouds in the sky.  i had the plane in the air just about five min.  as my plane came around to the east i could see a white sphere traveling from north to south.  it lookded to be about 5,000.Ft up.  at an angle from me about 40 deg. it's size was about the size of a thumb tack head.  the sphere looked like it was just north of mckinney.  it was traveling at a steady clip fairly quickly across the sky.  i circled the rc plane to keep it east of me so i could keep a watch on the sphere. i saw my wife comming at a distace i turned and called to her to look and i lost site of the white sphere.  she didn't here me telling her to look.  but when she found out what i was saying she took some pictures of the sky. i'm inclosing one of the pictures of what she took with the camera.  i think it is just a jet plane and it's vapor trail.  she seems to think it is more,  i'll let you decide.
content.summary: White sphere traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching tv, the wife was laying on the couch directly infront of the television, and i on the other couch to the left.  the tv is inbetween a window and a 3 season room that is all windows.  out of nowhere my wife jumps up and runs toward the window and then to the door.  i asked what was going on, was it a visitor, was it  some one breaking into our neighbors house, what are you looking at.  she starts asking me, "did you see it, did you see it?!?!?"  i told her i did not, and what was i suppose to see?  she described an object that was rectangle in shape and had two lights on the outside.  i said it must have been a plane or something, but she disagreed saying no it was right above our neighbors tree.  the tree is probably 35-40 feet tall.  we stayed outside for a while longer and saw nothing else.  we came back inside continued watching more tv and she jumps up again.  this time i was close behind her and we went outside.  and sure enough there it was doing a u turn hovered above our neighbors house for maybe 5 seconds and then took off.  i don't know what it was i don't believe it was a plane because of how low it was.
content.summary: 2 quick viewings of rectangular object above neighbors house.

content.detailedDescription:
At aprox. 2am pacific coast time i stepped out front of my residence in pacheco, ca to have a cigarette before i was about to retire.  i live near east of martinez and west of concord, ca about 1 to 3 miles west and about 2 to three hundred feet above buchanan airfield with a good view of mt. diablo to the east.  so i'm out front gazing into the clear dark sky as i do every night when smoking or not.  i clearly identify the big dipper to the north as 
it's reaching it's zenith and various stars moving across the sky as always.  
now i'm thirty one years of age and i know how stars and constellations track 
across our night sky.  i spend no less than 10 minutes each night in poor to excellent conditions identifying stars and planets.  i know that most stars visible to the naked eye tend to twinkle due to dust and various pollutants in our atmosphere.  i know planets tend not to twinkle such as mars when a few months ago was very clear and consistent nightly.  i read and update myself on the latest astronomy and science as much as possible. ok so as im smoking and gazing across the sky, i look to the east above and to the right of mt. diablo where i see a bright orange and white star-like object at about
40 degrees.  first i think it's venus but this object was much closer and it did not move.  about three minutes of observing this object i begin to see it moving and zigzaging from east to west north to south and up and down in elevation.  now i'm a very rational thinker so i begin to eliminate  all the possible reasons that this object could be behaving.  after about 8 minutes now i decide to wake my sister to look.  she first as i did thought it was a star or venus but after several more minutes she too notices that the object is moving around hovering for aprox. 15-45 seconds then moving almost dancing 
in all directions then returning to hover and so on and so on.  now this is just the beginning as i notice more objects one of which was directly above behaving in the exact way. in all i observed 6 to 12 objects that were moving
but most importantly they remained fixed in the sky compared to stars in the background that were tracking as i usually see.  i witnessed two objects appear and travel due east at incredible speeds.  like i said i live very close to buchanan  airfield. i see many types of planes, helicopters, and jets.  these objects had no blinking lights, some especially the first one i saw seemed to change size.  i compare it to smoke ring when blown from the mouth as it bends and changes in size.  ok so i first called 911, the dispatcher said that she would tell an on duty officer and verified my number in case they wanted to return for more info.
i then called buchanan airfield and talked to an on duty personnel who said 
he would take a look.  no response from either.  these objects were in formation, moving in directions i have never seen. in total including myself there were 4 witnesses all family and one contacted by phone who lives in walnut creek who also identified the first witnessed object. i took pictures and viewed through my galileo f600x50 telescope.  i have yet to look at the pics.  my camera is a digital nikon 8800 vr.  i would very much like to know if anyone else saw this most incredible sighting.  i'm am willing to make drawings, provide more info and anything else i can to document this sighting.  this is my second ufo report and i'm quite certain
that it won't be my last.


thank you,

ted heffel

(925)849-4968
(925)812-2164
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple glowing objects at various heights and degrees hovering, zigzaging, and moving at fast rates of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
The witness, pat, was in miami going to sunset drugs on 57th ave (
red road) to pick up a prescription. as she turned from 104 st. to 57th ave. she saw a glove-shaped object at treetop level over a canal.  the globe had a reflective, metallic surface and a curled-back platform which extented a little highter than the center of the globe.  from under the platform shone beautiful turquoise and some white lights.  pat turned the car around and followed the object which was moving slowly and then hovering over the canal.  suddenly, without turning, the object took off to the southeast at an incredible speed.  amazed, pat went home withough picking up the prescription.

mary margaret zimmer fl asd fi
content.summary: Globe-like object in miami in 70's

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog for a walk on the evening of may 2nd.  it was a breathtakingly beautiful evening. a storm system had moved through and we had a very crisp clear evening making the stars shine brightly. as i was looking up enjoying the night sky i saw a very bright and large orange-yellowish object approaching from the south at a high rate of speed.  the size comparison would have been about 1/4 of the size of the moon in the night sky.  i watch airline taffic regularly as it tracks over our house and am very familiar with all types of aircraft and their lighting configurations.  this was no aircraft. it went from horizon(south to north)to horizon in a matter of seconds. there was no sound and it did not lose its brightness as it tracked north as would a satelite, its brightness remained much like a brightly lit flare would look. at first i thought it was the iss until i checked its scheduled flight patterns.  it was not scheduled to be in our area until 5 hours later that day. not sure what it was other than it was very unusual.
content.summary: Fast moving orange object

content.detailedDescription: The witness, pat, was in miami
content.summary: Globe-like object in miami in 70's

content.detailedDescription: The witness, pat,
content.summary: Globe-like object in miami in 70's/ closed for administrative reasons

content.detailedDescription: Lying down on a flat fold out chair in front yard looking up at the      stars threw mostly clear sky.When under the clouds six or seven red,yellow,and white orbs or balls of light flying in a v formation went under and threw then back out of a small amount of clouds across the whole sky right above my hed in 5 seconds totaly sielent.I could tell it was not a solid craft because i could see the clouds in the middle of the v formation even though it was so fast and when they went threw the clouds the lights were kind of foggy looking.There was no sound!!And it flew perfectly straight.The v shape was pritty large,so it was ether very low or really big.This is one of about 14 differnt type of sightings i have had over plano texas for the past two years usauly from may to august.That was one of the best ones ive seen.The first one i saw i couldnt sleep for three days now i wonder, why am i fieling a report? what can anyone do?Thats not our technology it was as if it interd into our demention for a few seconds then left.
content.summary: Six orbes in v formation different colours flying under clouds fast,and silent

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the floor of my porch with my back against a wall and was looking up facing north west. i noticed a light flying across the sky, which is not unusual because i live only a few miles from dulles airport, va. i tracked its course across the sky. i did not associate a noise with the light but since it looked to be so high up i did not expect to hear it for a while. as i said i live near the airport and spend most nice nights on the porch watching all the plain traffic so i am used to the lights and the delay before some of the noise or that some never reaches me. also i know that although from close up the plains have lots of lights form a distance they usually just look like a single white light. also i have seen the planes seam to hover from the effect of flying towards me and then when they turn it looks like the light suddenly started quickly in one direction. all this is to say that i can often see how some people might confuse such lights for ufos. 

this white light continued slowly across the sky arcing gently so that it started heading north west and was heading west at the end of the arc. its speed across the sky seamed appropriate for the apparent hight at which it looked to be traveling based on me only being able to make out the one white light. suddenly however the light made a sharp angle (definitely tighter than 100degrees) turn north east(it wasn't really a turn it was just suddenly heading in another direction with no curve or arc) and much faster than at its original speed, it kept up speed as it zagged back south west, then a rapid successions of what must have been 160-170 degree changes in direction at speed about three times (zig zig, literally, i did not expect that) before finishing its maneuver heading back west (in the sky it was now slightly further north of its original course west) it seamed to slow slightly at the end of the zig-zag but it was still moving twice as fast as when i originally spotted it. it was now heading west with the slightest curve south and continued for another inch of sky from my perspective and then disappeared. all of which took less than 10 seconds. 

i sat there dumbfounded for a few minutes. i have always been a believer in some other's sighting but never expected to see a fast light zig zag across the sky here in northern virginia. i would love to know if anyone else say it.
content.summary: Single white light at high altitude went from a slow arcing flight to fast zig zag before dissapearing on a straight course

content.detailedDescription:
I was lookin out my front porch door and,it came out of a storm cloud.
i could see that there a big dot in front of the flame plume,if it was a asteriod,it wouldnt have changed directions.
it was pretty impressive,,a very long tail,,not anything close to a high flying jet,,,,,,,not like a con trail that hangs in the sky for a while,it stayed right behind it ....
we have had quite a few earthquakes in this area ,,the dogs in the neiborhood were barking like ,,,here it comes again,,get ready..
thats when i went out to the porch ,,even my dog was whining.
thats when i saw it,,,all i can say is wow ,,i thought we was gonna get slammmed by an asteriod,,till it changed directions.

sorry i dont have a video cam,,,if i had one i had time to get it and capture it on video for ya,,it was pretty cool to see.
content.summary: Maybe  it was a asteriod but it changed directions

content.detailedDescription:
me and my girl friend were out side in my back yard looking at the stars at about 1 in the morning. it was a cloudless nite. in the middle of the sky suddenly appeared what looked like the britest star i had ever seen. after about 2 seconds it lost most of its light and started moving north at the speed of a satelite. after about 8 more seconds it just faded away.Not out of my site range but disaapeared.
   as it suddenly appeared i had a strong feeling it was a non terrestrial vehical and was under intelligent control as it appeared stationary then started moving.
content.summary: Brite yellow light suddenly appears in middle of sky fades away in 6 seconds

content.detailedDescription: At 4:05am i was taking a union pacific crew to their location (port laredo) located 12 miles out of laredo, texas and while we were waiting at the crossing for the train to finish going through we saw what at first looked like a plane coming north above ih-35 but as it got closer we knew that it was not a plane because it had no sound and when it turned east in front of us we saw many bright lights under the craft, said craft was traveling at a very low speed as if it was looking for something. we did not have a camera on hand at time of sighting but it is not the first time i see this ship roaming this location. once the train finished passing through this crossing less then a minute after it passed in front of us we could not see it any more. but as it was passing in front of us my cell phone's light came on, this object passed us about 70 to 80ft above us.
content.summary: Ufo seen coming north on ih-35 at 4:05am on 5/1/08

content.detailedDescription:
At home in oxford, uk, 2nd of may 2008. awake at 2am. there was a sound like a large explosion subdued by distance, after approximately 2 minutes at 2.22am i looked out of window and eventualy became aware of an overly bright star. it was a large white stationary star-like light. a helicopter or airplane was crossing the same part of the sky but much closer to earth, i watched to see the light more clearly when the craft passed (in a typical flight pattern) and as it did pass the light became much brighter and then seemed to retreat vertically at high speed becoming invisible.
i thought about the event this morning and considered that the light could not have been metrological, a star or planet.
content.summary: Large white stationary star-like light that retreated vertically at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

 

my name is william harris, a desert storm veteran and a 12 yr usaf veteran.  i want to make this report just to do my part so we can someday find out the truth.

 

my incident happened on thanksgiving in 88 or 89.  i���m not really sure of the actual year, however, i am 100% certain of the day and of what i experienced.  i would like to add that at that time i was assigned to a special ops unit in the usaf out of frankfurt germany and i was just visiting my in-laws for the thanksgiving holiday.

 

my father in law (howard lee, retired msgt, usaf and drug counselor) and i went fishing up in the mountains of alamogordo, nm on thanksgiving.  we fished silver lake all day and were suppose to come home early for dinner, but decided to stay late since the trout were biting pretty good that day.  by time we were on our way back home to alamogordo, it was dark, however, it was a very clear night with no clouds or overcast.  we���re driving up and down hills coming from the mountains.  alamorgodo, nm is home to holliman afb and next to the white sands missile range.  also, this little city is based at the bottom of the mountain range and it is pretty flat down in the basin where the city sits.  

 

anyway, as we are going up and down hills, we finally get the part of the trip, where you can actually see the entire basin, the city and a little past the city, there are two large mountains or very large hills (they are the only two large landmarks on the other side), which are located behind the city from where we were coming from.  as we are driving i started looking at the two mountains ahead of us and i noticed some lights by them. as i started watching them fascinated by the brightness of them, i noticed that there were three lights and they were moving in odd ways.  one would go up vertically, then speed off at a 45 degree angle behind the mountain, then it would speed back in front of the mountain.  then soon, 2 more lights joined them.  i would describe them as bright white spheres.  anyway, these 5 spheres or lights, were just doing the most unimaginable maneuvers in front of these two mountains.  i watched them for about 3 minutes to make sure i was not seeing things and finally told my father in law about them.  he started watching them as well and after a couple of minutes, he stated what the hell is that? we watched them for over 15 minutes and the entire time they were flying, hovering, speeding from point to point and even at times disappearing and reappearing on the other side of the mountains.

 

i must state that i worked on the flight-line a lot, during the day and night and am very familiar with aircraft lights, at night, during the day and have a lot of experience working at night on the flight line. i can tell an aircraft or a helicopter with no problem.  i must also state that during my assignment in special ops, our unit worked closely with navy seabees, 82nd airborne, usaf special forces (combat control teams) and even had the opportunity to support delta force.  our unit covered all of africa, europe and the middle east, so any missions, wars, conflicts or humanitarian efforts in those theaters, we covered and supported via the flight-line, during day, night, snow, sun etc..

 

getting back to my incident.  i guess it���s hard for me to describe exactly what the 5 spheres were doing except by saying they were kinda of doing a star shaped pattern next to the mountains.  also, i could not make out the details of the mountains, but i could see two huge dark silhouettes of the mountains.  these spheres were disappearing behind it then reappearing when they got to the other side.  it would take them maybe 1 or 2 seconds to go from the 1 o���clock of the mountains to the 7 o���clock position, then streak across the mountains again to the 3 o���clock position. etc. if you draw a star with your pencil, that is exactly what they were doing.  

 

 

i tried to draw a diagram below, with the mountains being the black and the patterns of these orbs in red.  please understand, that these crafts or lights, were disappearing behind the mountains and sometimes flying in front of the mountains, so i could see very well that they were in close proximity of those hills, where they could fly behind them and in front of them. these things were extremely fast and their maneuvers were unbelievable.  i have flown on a lot of military planes and  helicopters, i have been to many air shows, and as stated earlier have worked on the flight-line extensively.  so i have seen most usaf aircraft, f15, f16, a10, f18, b1 bomber, b2 bomber, etc t38, kc 135, c130, c5, c141, etc, etc,  i am very familiar with those aircrafts and what they look like and what they can do.

 

in conclusion, either i witnessed a new secret aircraft being tested that we have no knowledge about or i saw a ufo (i���m not saying flying saucer), just unidentified.  this incident has stayed with me for a long time and to this day, i cannot imagine any aircraft doing those maneuvers. these things were super super fast, agile and could stop on a dime.  as stated they would fly in front and the back of the two mountains so i could see them moving, speeding, disappearing, reappearing and hovering.

 

i guess we could have been maybe 5-10 miles away.  i could clearly see the silhouttes of the mountains and could see these things fly in front and in back of the mountains.  we were close to whitesands testing facilities, so either new technology or the dreaded word ufo.  i also am very aware of the sr71 and the fact that it was activated n 1964 or 68 and as an active duty member, we really didn���t start seeing pictures of it till about 84 so they kept that out of the public eye for a long time.  these things were not conventional aircrafts.  i currently work for the dod as a logistician.

 

thank you for your time.

 

william l. harris

405-314-3715 cell
content.summary: Watched for 15-20 minutes objects doing incredible maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: I summon ufo's everyday and i have seen 100's of them and even filmed maybe about 100 of them. hope you check out my incredible story , i told the news and the press to no avail. to see the video evidence please visit my yt page here's the url   http://www.Youtube.Com/prophetezikel    i challenge you guys over there at mufon to view the evidence and truthfully explain what i have on video. peace
content.summary: I am a ufo summoner

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on the road
2.I saw some lights inthe sky but it dident look like a helecopter or an airplane
3. i thought it was a helicopter 
4.It hoverd in the sky then it moved very slowly then stoped again moved across my house 
5. i felt amazed that i saw some theing that i could nought identify
6. it went behind some trees but when i moved bheind the trees it was gone
content.summary: Two blinking lights over some trees

content.detailedDescription:
two lights over pond in woods, one bright and the other larger and wider of orange color which appear after 7:30 pm.  camera observation reveals two rectangular craft one under the other. both craft on right side have a face that changes its expression. left side of craft (person���s view) is bright and portioned by wavy panel. a life form to the right of the panel appears to be piloting craft, is aware of our observation, and has been observed to wave and beam out lighted holograms (faces). the top craft on its top left side has an electronic type of projection that appears as a face hologram. at its neck level, computer like instrument panel has small light that has flickered like robot talking. observation conforms to vallee���s type ��� i (b) (c) classification description. when brighter light is observed, it grows in intensity and size. 

has been viewed after 7:30 pm for last 4 days. on 3rd evening witness observed it with me. craft has communicated with us via the crafts face gestures, pilot emitting hollograms from the craft, and viewing us with light beams from projection at left top of craft.  my first reaction was denial, 
astonishment, and now feeling nervous.  incident has been camera recorded and discussed with responsible others who have encouraged me to discuss and be advised by professional's knowledgeable about this type of incident. such help from your organization would be appreciated. please use only the telephone number provided for contacting me. i believe the lights are still there. observed the light during the day to day.
content.summary: Two glowing rectangles, one on top of other with face like image on right, pilot in center, electronic projection top left of top craft

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 1982.  my husband worked as a manager for a local fast food restaurant in pueblo co.  this event happened around 2-3am.  my husband received a call from the local police dept that the alarms were going off in the restaurant and he needed to come down to the store and check it out, however the police could not meet him there because they were swamped with alarm calls.  i guess the whole south side of pueblo was going off. my husband left and i got out of bed and went down stairs to wait for him (i was worried about him going into the restaurant without the police).  i was sitting at the kitchen table in the dark with the front door open and just the screen door between me and the outside porch.
three different times during (i would say about 15 minutes) i heard what sounded like bacon sissling and then a loud click (almost like the click you hear when you turn on and off a light switch) when i heard the click a bright green light would shine into the house from all the windows and doors (it reminded me of a sort of spot light affect) i got up and walked to the front door to look out and could not see anything in front of me, but i wanted to step out onto the porch and look up... ( i also felt a strong feeling of "you really don't want to see this") my husband at the time was coming home and was witnessing the light from the corner of our street.  when he saw me opening the front screen door, he drove up the street and jumped out of the car and pushed me into the house.  we don't know what it was, but i was 3 months pregnant at the time and i worried about it my whole pregnancy.  i don't know what it was and it still haunts me to this day.  i know we are not the only ones in the universe.
pueblo is south of co. springs and norad.  we never heard nothing about it.
content.summary: Hugh bright green light

content.detailedDescription: Took pic of a customer and there it was. if it is something i will give full details.Please crop out my customer. look just above her head to the center.Please let me know what you find
content.summary: In picture i took

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling on a greyhound bus from lancaster, pa to denver, co, somewhere in kansas near topeka, when i looked out the window and saw a circular disk with lights all around the edges.

i am in contact with aliens who now claim they are from tau ceti, the "black triangle civilization" (as they like to be called for now), and they telepathed to me to look out the window.

apparently, there is cooperation among several space alien civilizations right now to protect me from the president bush and the armed personnel of the united states.  i have disseminated information which may have jeapordized the efforts to hide the truth about space aliens among said personnel.

i beg mufon not to mention my name in association with any of my claims, as it would cause the space aliens to have to exert more power to protect me. over.

jonathan keith sheriff, ba

ps - for more information about me and the tau cetians, please read all of the entries on the mufon webboards under the name "smokeytbones". over.
content.summary: Lighted circular disk

content.detailedDescription:
My friend of all my life, has randomly mentioned to me seeing a strange light over a farm area in greene ny where we live. my friend told me "on my way home i see this just small light hovering with no sound then its just gone." this anomily stumps me and i have asked questiones. another one of my friend this time a female has also in the same area of greene ny seen strange lights and told me " it felt like when i came home something was going to be in the house and has been watching my "every" move." she also told me that one of here friemds had something follow her home one night a 3am. a light followed the car from above behing and in front of the car. 
  myself i have not yet seen these lights although i am compelled to look for such, im starting to beleive or really want to know for sure the truth. some of the facts on the ufo shows i have seen are unhumanly possible and i am only writing to you in hopes for some kind of answer. 
  to me if we are uncapable of such flight and speed why havent we been taught such. we have obviously been deemed not a threat. a good thing if we are so unadvanced. it just makes everyday a big lie. if so. that we may never be so advanced. i will look in the area of sightings where my friends have seen and i shall see for myself if the truth is out there. please get back to me.
content.summary: Seen by friend and others, short time seen, small light, disapiered, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dog at 9p.M., and turned the corner around the side of the house to come back inside, when i saw a huge "craft" with red and green flashing lights floating/hovering over the high school athletic field next to my house.  it appeared as an elongated disc-shaped object and seemed to be floating mid-air, a few hundred ft. off the ground. i watched it for several minutes, awestruck at what i was seeing.  i took the dog inside, and called the police non-emergency #, to see if anyone had also reported seeing it.  they said, "yes", and that it had also been seen over another school in a different part of town.  i described what i was seeing, hung up and went back outside to view it again.  i watched it for another few minutes.  it would sit still for a time, with only the lights flashing, then it would move up and down slightly, and turn from side to side.  i came back into the house and called a neighbor, who went out and called me back to say both of them saw it.  i went back outside, it was still hovering, then turning slowly, and then it looked like it was descending, which made me feel a bit fearful, so i went back in to call the police again, and when i came back out, it was gone.  that was the last i saw of it.  i watched it for a total of about 20 minutes. unfortunately, i don't own a video camera, but it would surprise me if no one else caught it on film.  i called the police this morning to see if they had figured out what it was, and they said no, but they filed their own eyewitness official police report about it.  evidently, they had seen it, as well.
content.summary: Huge elongated disc with flashing red/green lights, no sound, hovering, floating over high school field

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking the dog in my backyard and i heard a noise similiar to the sound a blower makes on a high performance engine, i looked up and this craft was hovering over me about 300 feet in the sky. my dog was now cowering at my feet, and i felt like a warm beam of light go across my face. i picked up my dog and began to back away the craft went higher in the sky maybe another 300 feet i used the treeline to approximate the hieght. i continued about 100 feet back to my home ran inside to get my camera when i came back out it was gone
content.summary: Triple chevron shaped object with lights on all points

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what the cause was but myself, my wife, brother and sister-in-law were driving down the coast just south of san franciso and we could see a very strange light that appeared only a few feet in depth but extended north and south across the ocean as far as we could see. it appeared to be moving slowly toward the east and appeared like a blue light that was reading a bar code. we made a turn from the coast highway which runs north and south toward the east (toward our home). we drove slowly and watched the light coming closer and closer. when we started driving up our street which rises to the east we could see the light was still coming toward us. finally it caught up with us and went right over our car at about what appeared to be 5 miles an hour. the light was very blue. it seemed unusual in that it was a heavy blue that looked intensly deep in color. we then sat and watched as it continued to move eastward until it passed over the mountain in front of us, to the east, and out of our sight. my brother went in and called the pacifica police and asked if they had any reports of the blue light and they said yes, many. the interesting thing was that we could not see any source for the light and it extending for at least 20-25 miles north to south and was only a couple feet wide. we thought at the time that it might have been a satellite or something similar and we stood looking for some time but could never find any indication of where it came from. as a note, i think that it must have passed over the san francisco airport as that was the direction it was moving. they might have a record of the event or even an eplanation. the date, including the year may not be exact but i could confirm more with my family if necessary. also, i am a licensed aircraft mechanic (a & p mechanic license wth an r & e license) and i worked for many years as an engineer for united airlines before retiring two years ago. i also worked with many aircraft while in the us navy but have never seen anything like this before or since.
content.summary: Blue light moving slowly a few feet wide and many miles long

content.detailedDescription: I was in the army signal corps radar school at fort monmouth from january until july of 1952. some of the advanced students had progressed to the point where they were operating the radar units. they reported tracking an object moving at a high rate of speed and making a right angle turn that no airplane could have made.A short time later,all radar students were taken into a large empty building and told that had seen nothing,heard nothing,and knew nothing about the matter.That was an order.I was not one of the advanced students.I only tell you this now in case it ties in with other data from that era.
content.summary: Object detected on radar at ft. monmouth army base

content.detailedDescription:
Ann and her husband were preparing to go to bed in their bedroom when they saw a huge bright light appear over grants pass peak which is about a mile from their home.

the solid white light approximately the size of a house was slowly flying in a straight line from north to south at an angle to their bedroom. they were able to watch the object for about two minutes until it passed out of view from their window.

as soon as the light was not visible from their bedroom window ann grabbed a spot light and rushed into the back yard where she continued to watch the light for approximately another three minutes. 

she flashed the spot light at the light but had no response.

she watched the object slowly moving to the south until it disappeared right in front of her eyes.

ann has seen several unknowns around grants pass peak since moving into the area about 8 years ago. she enjoys watching them and is very curious as to why there is so much unknown activity around the mountain
content.summary: Huge white light flying slowly over grants pass peak

content.detailedDescription:
I was delivering a pizza and as i was walking to the house my attention was drawn to the sky by a blue/green/white flashing behind the cloud cover. out from the clouds came what could only be described as a turquoise comet in the memphis sky. it was entirely too close to actually be a comet. 

i was involuntarily trying to convince my self that this was a firework or something terrestrial, as i had a sighting almost a week before (also posted on the mufon database). there were sparks coming off the tail. the tail was incredibly long and fat, and it stretched across the sky. the tail was also phenomenally luminescent, i had seen its light through the clouds, and when it came from behind the cloud, it seemed to light up the whole sky.

then the tip of the "comet" broke up into 4 or 5 lights with smaller tails, they danced around the small area around the original ball area of the comet and converged again before the whole thing disappeared. 

i could no longer rationalize what i had seen. i completed the delivery in shock, unable to stop myself from telling the customer what i had just seen in the sky behind their house. i forgot about the rest of the deliveries i had with me until i got back to the store.

upon returning to my car, i saw that my girlfriend had called. she had seen the same thing from a different part of town. i was sure that other people had seen it, because its light had seemed to illuminate the whole sky, but no one i know had.
content.summary: Tip of a giant blue fireball splits into 4 parts and converges before disappearing
